text: Salsuginibacillus halophilus is a Gram-positive, halophilic, alkalitolerant, endospore-forming and rod-shaped bacterium from the genus of Salsuginibacillus which has been isolated from sediments from the Xiarinaoer soda lake in Mongolia. ==References== Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2010
title: Salsuginibacillus halophilus
